item.description:
Since no has signed up who wants to rent a boat I am officially changing this.  I've made the executive decision to do the trip from Sumner Falls down to the Cornish Landing just before the Windsor covered bridge.  It had more going for it.  Perhaps we could do the other longer trip in August.

We will meet at the Route 91 exit 9 park and ride (on the east side of the highway) at 10am.  We'll then caravan up to Sumner Falls and drop off the boats, then take some vehicles down to Cornish Landing to leave there.

If anyone has a truck or vehicle that can accommodate more than one kayak, please let me know (besides Nat, Joe, and John).

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Kayak down the Connecticut River
